LTDLWOCR.ot: FISH & NEAVE 1251 AVENUE of the AMERICAS, NEW YORK, N.Y. 10020 COPY February 23, 1993 VIA TELECOPIER James E. Schardt, Esq. Assistant General Counsel Philip Morris Management Corp. Legal Department Research Center - Door 17 4201 Commerce Road Richmond, Virginia 23234 Norwegian Patent Appln. No. P90 2494 PM 1357 - Norway Dear Jim: As you know, a response to the September 30, 1992 Official Action in the above-identified application must be filed by February 28, 1993. Enclosed are the instructions I have prepared for Mr. Marlow of Reddie & Grose in connection with that response. To date, we have received no indication from you that the substance of these instructions is unacceptable. Therefore, I plan to fax the enclosed instructions to Mr. Marlow at the close of today's business day unless I receive contrary instructions from you. Sincerely, Brenda J.
